thread.title: George Osborne's savvy display lacked tough fiscal action
thread.title_full: George Osborne's savvy display lacked tough fiscal action

author: Liam Halligan
title: George Osborne's savvy display lacked tough fiscal action
text: Economics George Osborne’s savvy display lacked tough fiscal action The Chancellor has rightly won political plaudits for his Budget performance, but beyond such eye-catching political gamesmanship are some uncomfortable fiscal truths The Chancellor didn’t unveil £12bn of welfare savings last Wednesday, as expected, but just £7bn instead Photo: EPA
